item.title: Disney Takes Control Of NFL Network As League Gains 10% ESPN Ownership
item.description: The NFL sells most media businesses to Disney in exchange for 10% stake in ESPN, expected to reshape sports media landscape. read more

item.title: Why Astera Labs Shares Are Trading Higher By Over 17%; Here Are 20 Stocks Moving Premarket
Trump Says TSMC Will Invest $300 Billion In Arizona, Teases New Chip Tariffs To Boost US Manufacturing
item.description: President Donald Trump said Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. would invest $300 billion in Arizona to boost U.S. chip production. read more
